thread.title: Tigers' Simon admits left knee has bothered him all year

title: Tigers' Simon admits left knee has bothered him all year
text:
Published By: Detroit Free Press - Today 
The right-hander tried to avoid going on DL for the knee, but will get injection in it today in Detroit ...
